comments.body: Quote from: agentF on June 19, 2023, 07:42:58 PMCan i use it on Apple Tv? Yes it can be used.You can open the app store on your apple tv & search for IPTV Smarters. You can see an app named "IPTV Smarters Pro/Lite"Omen TV works with that app.lmk if you have any other questions.
